title: Encounters with Evil
overview: Encounters with Evil brings viewers face to face with the world's most infamous killers. From psychopaths and cult leaders to kidnappers, the programs explore the minds of those convicted of the world's most notorious violent crimes. The series draws upon archive footage, combined with new insights and analysis as well as interviews with those closest to the cases. Each episode looks at a number of key cases and a panel of experts examine and reveal what drove each killer to commit their crimes.
